info.name: No more "OPEN REDDIT APP" in reddit for phones
info.description: A tiny CSS theme that removes the OPEN REDDIT APP floating button and other irritating overlays in the smartphone version of the website reddit.com. Everything else is left untouched.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0 Removed the floating button and the floating ad bar
v1.1 Removed the overlay asking if you want to open the app or continue browsing and the ads about the reddit app.
